name: AddAttitude
0:
”Alexa, ask Add Attitude give me something to laugh about”
”Alexa, open Add Attitude”
”Alexa, ask Add Attitude to tell me something I don't know”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: add attitude
des:
This is a prank app and almost all of the information given is fake
Features
-ask for greetings
-ask for weather
-ask for "facts"
-ask for politics
-ask for music
-ask for Jokes

All the answers to the above category are fake, and most of them are not meant for kids. They are purely for jokes and pranks on friends, family, etc...

Have a good time with this app, and make sure to rate it, so that we can update it to support more questions and answers.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
